definitions.definition: Having traits or characteristics in common ; alike , allied , comparable .
examples: My new car is quite similar to my old one, except it has a bit more space in the back.

definitions.definition: Having the same shape , in particular, having corresponding angles equal and corresponding line segments proportional.
Of two square matrices ; being such that a conjugation sends one matrix to the other.

main_definition: Having traits or characteristics in common ; alike , allied , comparable .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Having the same shape , in particular, having corresponding angles equal and corresponding line segments proportional.
( mathematics , linear algebra ) Of two square matrices ; being such that a conjugation sends one matrix to the other.
